korean: 서러운 맘을 못 이겨 잠 못 들던 어둔 밤을 또 견디고
english: I can’t beat my sad heart again, I’m enduring the dark and sleepless nights

korean: 내 절망관 상관없이 무심하게도 아침은 날 깨우네
english: Without regard for my despair, the morning indifferently wakes me

korean: 상처는 생각보다 쓰리고
english: The wound burns more than expected

korean: 아픔은 생각보다 깊어가
english: The hurt goes deeper than expected

korean: 널 원망하던 수많은 밤이 내겐 지옥같아
english: The countless nights of resenting you are like hell to me

korean: 내 곁에 있어줘 내게 머물러줘
english: Please stay at my side, please stay with me

korean: 네 손을 잡은 날 놓치지 말아줘
english: Please don’t let go of the me who is holding your hand

korean: 이렇게 니가 한걸음 멀어지면
english: If you go one step further away like this

korean: 내가 한걸음 더 가면 되잖아
english: I can just take one more step and that’s enough

korean: 하루에도 수천번씩 니 모습을 되뇌이고 생각했어
english: I’ve been thinking about you thousands of times a day

korean: 내게 했던 모진 말들 그 싸늘한 눈빛 차가운 표정들
english: The harsh words you said to me, that icy gaze and cold expression

korean: 넌 참 예쁜 사람 이었잖아
english: You were such a pretty person

korean: 넌 참 예쁜 사람 이었잖아
english: You were such a pretty person

korean: 제발 내게 이러지 말아줘 넌 날 잘 알잖아
english: Please don’t be like this to me, you know me well

korean: Oh girl 그때 가볍게 한 말이 진짜 가볍게 만들어 우리 사일
english: Oh girl The words that you said so lightly at that time

korean: 익숙함이란게 무엇보다 무서운줄 몰라
english: I didn’t know that ‘being used to it’ would be scarier than anything

korean: 니 속맘도 몰라 결국 후회 가득한 너와의 이별까지
english: I didn’t know your heart, up until we ultimately said goodbye full of regret

korean: 날이 갈수록 커져가 니 빈자린
english: As the days pass it gets bigger, the empty space you left

korean: Oh shit 아름답던 우리 꽃밭에 물을 줘봐도
english: Oh shit, even if we give water to our flower bed that used to be beautiful

korean: 다 추억들만 만개한채 그리움의 향만 뿜어 나와
english: Full blooms have all become nothing but memories only the scent of loneliness gushes forth

korean: 널 다시 볼수있다면 나, 내 모든 걸 보여주고 파
english: If I could see you again I, I want to show you everything I have

korean: 널 꽉 안아 뛰고 있는 내 맘 꼭 다 너에게 전하고파 나
english: My heart that’s beating to hold you tight I want to convey it all to you, I

korean: For real, for real 이 진심이 니품에 안길때까지
english: For real, for real, until you hold this sincerity in your embrace once again

korean: 그냥 날 안아줘 나를 좀 안아줘
english: Just hold me, hold me a little

korean: 아무 말 말고서 내게 달려와줘
english: Don’t say anything and please just run to me

korean: 외롭고 불안하기만 한 맘으로
english: With a heart that’s nothing but lonely and anxious

korean: 이렇게 널 기다리고 있잖아
english: I’m waiting for you like this

korean: 난 너를 사랑해 난 너를 사랑해
english: I love you. I love you in the long silence

korean: 긴 침묵 속에서 소리 내 외칠게
english: A sound comes, screaming

korean: 어리석고 나약하기만 한 내 마음을...
english: From my foolish and weak heart…
